mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_ranking (id,matchTypeId,clubId, matchTimes, victory, draw, negative, goals, conceded, goalDifference, score, season, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{id}, #{matchType.id},#{club.id}, #{matchTimes}, #{victory}, #{draw}, #{negative}, #{goals}, #{conceded}, #{goalDifference}, #{score}, #{season}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.select: SELECT id, matchTypeId, clubId, matchTimes, victory, draw, negative, goals, conceded, goalDifference, score, season, gmt_create createTime, gmt_modified modifiedTime FROM tb_ranking WHERE id = ${id}
select count(*) from tb_ranking where clubId = #{club.id} AND season = #{season}
SELECT id, matchTypeId, clubId, matchTimes, victory, draw, negative, goals, conceded, goalDifference, score, season, gmt_create createTime, gmt_modified modifiedTime FROM tb_ranking

SELECT a.id, a.matchTypeId, a.clubId, b.name clubName, b.imgUrl clubImgUrl, a.matchTimes, a.victory, a.draw, a.negative, a.goals, a.conceded, a.goalDifference, a.score, a.season FROM tb_ranking a LEFT JOIN tb_club b ON a.clubId = b.id WHERE matchTypeId = #{matchTypeId}
mapper.update: update tb_ranking set victory = (victory + 1), goals = #{goals}, conceded = #{conceded}, score = (score + 3) where matchTypeId = #{matchType.id} AND clubId = #{club.id} AND season = #{season}
update tb_ranking set draw = (draw + 1), goals = #{goals}, conceded = #{conceded}, score = (score + 1) where matchTypeId = #{matchType.id} AND clubId = #{club.id} AND season = #{season}
